item.title: Minting own cryptocurrency
item.description: The year 2024 marked another thrilling crypto bull run, capturing widespread mainstream attention. In this blog, weâ€™ll take you through the entire process of minting your own cryptocurrency on the Solana blockchain, listing it on a crypto exchange to monetize your efforts, and exploring how bad actors could exploit these same steps to commit fraud.
